name: Drakengard 2
synopsis: Drakengard 2 is the sequel to the original Drakengard, which was brought to America by Square Enix. This addition to the series continues the action-focused role-playing gameplay as you continue to explore and protect the red dragons. The game combines 3D flying and shooting aspects, as well as ground combat. Drakengard 2 adds new features, such as the ability to switch among characters and to use magic.
